title: Does George Soros face more than $1.8 billion in prison for "disputed" campaign contributions?
subtitle: The extremist party websites published false allegations about the contributions of the billionaire candidates to the local prosecutors ' races in 2018.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The billionaire political activist George Soros can go to prison for the years of $1.8 billion in contributions to the "opposition" campaign for candidates in local prosecutors' elections.
